narrative=Trevor Taylor was last seen leaving his home on Kingsford Road, Alford. After an exchange with his brother, Trevor left on his bicycle, heading towards Beltie Road. A search began, focusing initially near Golden Knowes Road in Aberdeenshire, where a colleague of Trevor's father had spotted him earlier in the day. Trevor was safely reunited with his family, and the case was closed shortly after with no further incidents reported.
